ValidationRule.description: Ensures that user can only progress to the next stage which is Negotiate or mark the Opportunity as Discontinued.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Corporate_Partnership', ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(StageName) ,'Identify'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Negotiate')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Discontinued')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can only progress to the next stage which is Negotiate or mark the Opportunity as Discontinued
